alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 27 at 6:36AM AKDT until August 28 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast from Shishmaref to Cape Espenberg. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will wash away. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds will gust to 40 mph. These winds will push waves to the top of the beach causing erosion and washing away items left on the beach. The worst conditions will be on northwest facing beaches such as at Shishmaref. Winds and waves will decrease early Monday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
